Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/util/Resources/root
Synopsis Retrieve a full hierarchical representation of all resources in the Eclipse workspace.
Function Resource root()
Examples 
rascal>import util::Resources;
ok
rascal>root();
Resource: root({
    project(
      |project://Soup|,
      {
        folder(
          |project://Soup/std|,
          {
            file(|project://Soup/std/Relation.rsc|),
            file(|project://Soup/std/ATermIO.rsc|),
            file(|project://Soup/std/Graph.rsc|),
            file(|project://Soup/std/Exception.rsc|),
            file(|project://Soup/std/Type.rsc|),
            file(|project://Soup/std/Reflective.rsc|),
            file(|project://Soup/std/Origins.rsc|),
            file(|project://Soup/std/HTMLIO.rsc|),
            file(|project://Soup/std/Message.rsc|),
            file(|project://Soup/std/Strategy.rsc|),
            folder(
              |project://Soup/std/experiments|,
              {
                folder(
                  |project://Soup/std/experiments/resource|,
                  {
                    folder(
                      |project://Soup/std/experiments/resource/results|,
                      {
                        folder(
                          |project://Soup/std/experiments/resource/results/buffers|,
                          {folder(
                              |project://Soup/std/experiments/resource/results/buffers/.svn|,
                              {
                                folder(
                                  |project://Soup/std/experiments/resource/results/buffers/.svn/text-base|,
                                  {}),
                                folder(
                                  |project://Soup/std/experiments/resource/results/buffers/.svn/props|,
                                  {}),
                                folder(
                                  |project://Soup/std/experiments/resource/results/buffers/.svn/tmp|,
                                  {
                                    folder(
                                      |project://Soup/std/experiments/resource/results/buffers/.svn/tmp/prop-base|,
                                      {}),
                                    folder(
                                      |project://Soup/std/experiments/resource/results/buffers/.svn/tmp/text-base|,
                                      {}),
                                    folder(
                                      |project://Soup/std/experiments/resource/results/buffers/.svn/tmp/props|,
                                      {})
                                  }),
                                folder(
                                  |project://Soup/std/experiments/resource/results/buffers/.svn/prop-base|,
                                  {})
                              })}),
                        folder(
                          |project://Soup/std/experiments/resource/results/.svn|,
                          {
                            folder(
                              |project://Soup/std/experiments/resource/results/.svn/prop-base|,
                              {}),
